author: Joseph Guzman
title: Coronavirus patients are testing positive after recovery | TheHill - The Hill
description: Coronavirus patients are testing positive after recovery | TheHill The Hill View Full Coverage on Google News
content:
South Korea reported Monday that at least 116 people who were believed to have recovered from the novel coronavirus have tested positive for the virus again, according to Reuters.
